str2: Then, at that time. From ho and hote; the when, i.e. At the time that.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Prop: I fasten to; I lay hold of, touch, know carnally. Reflexive of hapto; properly, to attach oneself to, i.e. To touch.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
The eye; fig: the mind's eye. From optanomai; the eye; by implication, vision; figuratively, envy.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.
A primary particle; down, in varied relations (genitive, dative or accusative) with which it is joined).

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
Faith, belief, trust, confidence; fidelity, faithfulness.

parse: Verb - Aorist Imperative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: A prolongation and middle voice form of a primary verb; to cause to be, i.e. to become, used with great latitude.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
